message.raw:
Consistently set symbol export definitions

Updated each gazebo library CMakeLists.txt to consistently set the
-DBUILDING_DLL_GZ_* definitions using CMake add_defintions.  Also made
sure that the definitions were always being set; some were only
set when WIN32 was defined.
